message: Let's make a deal.  I'm feeling generous today, Bob.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
Bob, your offer was too greedy. I'm being fair, but the clock is ticking.
Alice, time is running out for both of us. I'm proposing a 55/45 split - my final offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit on my last offer.  Take it before the deal gets worse for you!
